about_the_game:
This downloadable soundtrack includes all 50 tracks from Mages of Mystralia, composed and arranged by Antoine Vachon, with more than 20 tracks featuring the Video Game Orchestra (renowned for their work on Final Fantasy XV, God Eater 2 and the Kingdom Hearts franchise). Available in FLAC and MP3 formats.

Album Credits:
Music Composed & Arranged by Antoine Vachon

Flute & Piccolo: Laura Intravia
Oboe, English Horn, Clarinet, Bass Clarinet & Bassoon: Kristin Naigus
Solo Cello: David Bouchard
Additionnal Violin: Mathieu Côté

Soundtrack Produced by: Antoine Vachon & Louis-Félix Cauchon
Mixing Engineer: Antoine Vachon
Cover Art: Clément Pernel

Antoine Vachon wishes to thank:
Élyse Canuel-Morissette, Geneviève Paquet, Daniel Vachon & Martha Hervieux, Philippe Vachon & Martine Roy, Sophie-Anne Vachon & Marc Trudel, François Suter, Sébastien Ménard, Williams Fonseca-Baeta, Julien Bérubé, Maxime Côté, Nicolas Bertrand-Verge, Benjamin Tessier & Jimi Steluvak
